message.raw:
Fixed layout bugs

Treeview row height should now be larger than the font
by a constant number of pixels, rather than simply a constant height.

Tab text should now be a fixed point size instead of number of pixels,
and tab width and height should be a constant number of pixels larger than
the text, rather than simply a constant height.

message:
Fixed layout bugs

Treeview row height should now be larger than the font
by a constant number of pixels, rather than simply a constant height.

Tab text should now be a fixed point size instead of number of pixels,
and tab width and height should be a constant number of pixels larger than
the text, rather than simply a constant height.
